name: Hoverrad
description:
While testing a new engine that can travel faster than the speed of light your ship got struck by an unknown weapon. 

Before losing conscious you heard the scientists screaming in terror and around you everything got blank. 

You wake inside your ship only with basic life support and all you can do is travel through the gates ahead of you and pray to get to the end of this madness where you fell like a bird trying to escape this mad ferris wheel. 

How long can you survive this trap?

Play on the go, play at home. Buying this Android game you get a PC version as a bonus! 

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
